languages.text:
Requires Overseer to have Dogmatic — 5
Cyber Mastif has +50% Wounds and +250% Damage
Cyber Mastiff attacks agains Xenos, Psykers and Demons always crit.

traits.locale_text:
Requires Overseer to have Dogmatic — 5
Cyber Mastif has +50% Wounds and +250% Damage
Cyber Mastiff attacks agains Xenos, Psykers and Demons always crit.

languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +250% more damage.
If the target is a xenos, psyker, or daemon, this always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g} hit.

traits.locale_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50% and it deals +250% more damage.
If the target is a xenos, psyker, or daemon, the hit is always {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g}.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +250% more damage.
If the target is a xenos, psyker, or daemon, this always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g} hit.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +250% more damage.
If the target is a xenos, psyker, or daemon, this always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g} hit.

languages.text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — фанатик
Кибермастиф получает +50% к {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимальному здоровью{/g} и наносит на 250% больше урона.
Если цель является ксеносом, псайкером или демоном, попадание всегда будет {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot

If the target is a xenos, psyker, or daemon, the hit is always {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — фанатик
{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}Максимальное здоровье{/g} кибермастифа увеличено на 50%, и он наносит на 250% больше урона.
Если цель является ксеносом, псайкером или демоном, попадание всегда будет {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.

Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — фанатик
{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}Максимальное здоровье{/g} кибермастифа увеличено на 50%, и он наносит на 250% больше урона.
Если цель является ксеносом, псайкером или демоном, попадание всегда будет {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.

Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — фанатик
Кибермастиф получает +50% к {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимальному здоровью{/g} и наносит на 250% больше урона.
Если цель является ксеносом, псайкером или демоном, попадание всегда будет {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g} ― 狂信者が必要
サイバーマスチフのg|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}{/g}が+50%上昇し、与えるダメージが+250%増加する。
対象がゼノ、異能者、またはデーモンである場合、その攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル{/g}になる。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50% and it deals +250% more damage.
If the target is a xenos, psyker, or daemon, the hit is always {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g} ― 狂信者が必要
サイバーマスチフのg|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}{/g}が+50%上昇し、与えるダメージが+250%増加する。
対象がゼノ、異能者、またはデーモンである場合、その攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル{/g}になる。

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} – Eiferer
Die {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Cyber-Mastiffs erhöhen sich um +50 % und er verursacht +250 % mehr Schaden.
Ist das Ziel ein Xenos, Psioniker oder Dämon, erzielt dieser Angriff immer einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen{/g} Treffer.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +250% more damage.
If the target is a xenos, psyker, or daemon, this always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g} hit.

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} – Eiferer
Die {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Cyber-Mastiffs erhöhen sich um +50 % und er verursacht +250 % mehr Schaden.
Ist das Ziel ein Xenos, Psioniker oder Dämon, erzielt dieser Angriff immer einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen{/g} Treffer.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatik{/g} — Bağnaz kanaati gerektirir
Siber mastifin {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanı +%50 artar ve iye, +%250 daha fazla hasar verir.
Hedef; zeno, ruhsezer veya iblisse bu vuruş her zaman {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşa{/g} dönüşür.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +250% more damage.
If the target is a xenos, psyker, or daemon, this always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g} hit.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatik{/g} — Bağnaz kanaati gerektirir
Siber mastifin {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanı +%50 artar ve iye, +%250 daha fazla hasar verir.
Hedef; zeno, ruhsezer veya iblisse bu vuruş her zaman {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşa{/g} dönüşür.

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} — Zélote.
Les {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximums{/g} du cyber-mastiff sont augmentées de +50 %, et il inflige +250 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Si la cible est un xénos, un psyker ou un démon, il inflige systématiquement un coup {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critique{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot

If the target is a xenos, psyker, or daemon, this always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g} hit.

traits.locale_text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} — Zélote.
Les {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximums{/g} du cyber-mastiff sont augmentées de +50 %, et il inflige +250 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Si la cible est un xénos, un psyker ou un démon, il inflige systématiquement un coup {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critique{/g}.

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}: Fanático
Las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del cibermastín aumentan en un +50 % e inflige un +250 % de daño adicional.
Si el objetivo es un xenos, psíquico o daemon, esto garantiza un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot

If the target is a xenos, psyker, or daemon, this always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g} hit.

traits.locale_text:

Si el objetivo es un xenos, psíquico o daemon, esto garantiza un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.

languages.text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}——狂热者
生化獒犬{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}提高50%，造成的伤害提高250%。
如果目标是异形、灵能者或恶魔，则此次攻击必定{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。
